title: The Tale Of The Bavarian Plum Tart Redux
teaser: Early August is a good time for Damson plums, and a better time for an encore about the Zwetschgendatschi. Vermont pastry chef Gesine Bullock-Prado says the plum tart reminds her of her late mother.
contentencoded:
Early August is a good time for Damson plums, and an even better time for an encore about the Zwetschgendatschi, a plum tart with an intimidating name. Vermont pastry chef Gesine Bullock-Prado says the tart reminds her of her late mother.
